title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 
is appointed as Special Adviser to Thomas Byrne, Minister of State at the 
Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect 
from 10 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 

7 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [213] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Teil: 046 942 3100 
r-phost: publications@opw.ie

DUBLIN

D08 XAO6
